name: Endless Battle (itch) (Game Dev SK)
description:
Instructions:

Controls: Use the mouse to aim and hold down the left mouse button to fire.

Scoring : 

-1 point on each fire.

+2 point on trooper kill.

+5 points on plane destroy.

1 or 2 points may be added additionally for other things like shooting the troop parachute etc.

Game Over: If 4 troops landed on either side of the tower game will end.

Make Your Best Score!

Best Of Luck!

Enjoy! Endless Battle
